Q_DESC:
Kevin wants to play a game. He has a positive integer N. Initially, he chooses an integer x such that 0=x=N. Then, he plays N rounds numbered from 1 to N. In round number i, he has to add or subtract i from the current value of his number x. If the new value of x remains non-negative and =N, then he wins this round. Otherwise, he loses and the game ends.

Kevin wants to win the maximum number of rounds. Help him.
